interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Aibilye Shower Cap, 3Pcs Shower Cap For Women,Shower Cap For Kids, Double Waterproof,Hair Care Cap,Salon Shower Cap,Reusable, Medium Size(STYLE-1) Review Date: 2021/01/29 Store: Aibilye Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aibilye', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Pattern': 'Floral', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 8.5 x 0.3 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: What amazing quality for this price! These are also reusable and I love these so much better than the cheap plastic ones!
Works great to keep my hair dry in the shower- I try not to wash my hair daily!
So happy with these!!! Review Title: Awesome product for the price Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber P.travel {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} [[VIDEOID:e63684315904fe3d7cd3092a12671e7d]] This is a great kit for my household. We do touch ups in between our appointments. The cape is thin and has small ties in the back but works perfect for both my husband and I. The scissors are a little bigger so for my smaller hands I could use a little bit smaller pair but it does the trick. I also have used the cape when I dye my roots and it works great to keep me protected. Perfect kit for my touch ups Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare Manilla Natural Skincare {'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I am a lover of high quality face serums because they soak into your skin without leaving you greasy like oils or lotions but unfortunately not all serums Are created equal. Some are packed with cheap oils and don’t truly work, well Not this one!!! This one is everything! I put it on all over my face, neck and especially under my eyes (which is my trouble spot because of little wrinkles) and this soaks in so beautiful. It hydrated that area so my makeup goes on like butter! It is a very light fresh smell- I almost don’t smell anything- which is perfect because my eyes can water so easy but not with this serum!
It’s vegan friendly too!
Manila serum is a must have in my morning routine. Obsessed with this serum Hylunia Hydrate Body Wash - Energizing Blend With Mango 8.5 oz Hylunia {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '059ENM-250-R', 'UPC': '185449000313'} This lathers up so nice and is beyond moisturizing to my skin. My skin felt fresh and so hydrated! The mango body wash smells so good that my husband even commented how yummy I smell. Obsessed with this mango body wash Aibilye Shower Cap, 3Pcs Shower Cap For Women,Shower Cap For Kids, Double Waterproof,Hair Care Cap,Salon Shower Cap,Reusable, Medium Size(STYLE-1) Aibilye {'Brand': 'Aibilye', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Pattern': 'Floral', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 8.5 x 0.3 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} What amazing quality for this price! These are also reusable and I love these so much better than the cheap plastic ones!
Works great to keep my hair dry in the shower- I try not to wash my hair daily!
So happy with these!!! Awesome product for the price
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** The user remains dedicated to personal grooming, with an emphasis on utilizing effective hair cutting and styling tools for home use, reflecting a strong DIY approach to hair care. Their recent acquisition of reusable shower caps underscores a commitment to maintaining hair health while showering.

- **Skincare Interest:** Their skincare interests have expanded to encompass facial and body care, particularly favoring hydrating formulations that provide a luxurious sensory experience. They continue to prioritize moisturizing products across their routines.

- **Product Preference:** The user values comprehensive kits and effective solutions, seeking products that yield noticeable results over superficial benefits. Their satisfaction with quality brands aligns with a preference for functional, practical items.

- **Practicality:** Maintaining a practical mindset, the user appreciates ergonomic, versatile solutions for both hair and skincare, emphasizing ease of use and user-friendly designs.

- **Multi-Use Capability:** They continue to favor multi-functional items, utilizing hydrating products effectively across different body areas and enhancing their overall care routine.

- **Overall Experience:** With a consistent positive interaction with reputable brands known for effective, quality products, the user demonstrates a preference for conscientious personal care solutions, including vegan-friendly options. The commendation for quality shower caps reflects their detail-oriented approach and commitment to maintaining their personal care standards.
